head.description: Settings for the Network Usage Applet (uses vnstati)

useExtendedDisplay.tooltip: This is a new option from version 1.0.3

extendedDisplay.tooltip: This feature offers the Classic (original) display with a number of other options including use of a user defined string for vnstati when enabled below

useVnstatiCommandString.tooltip: Beware - no error checking - if you crash the applet try restarting Cinnamon

vnstatiCommandString.description: Custom options to pass to vnstati - default is '-s'
vnstatiCommandString.tooltip: Note: this is not the whole vnstati option string - the interface and output file options are added to it automatically. Please read the vnstati manual for further information on options avaiilable
